resources.string: Assist with filling username and password fields in other apps and on the web.

It can be difficult and insecure for users to switch between apps to copy/paste username and password information from their Cozy Pass vault.\n\nUsing this accessibility service allows Cozy Pass to detect and read input fields on your device\'s screen. Whenever Cozy Pass detects a password field on the screen a notification will appear that allows you to quickly access your Cozy Pass vault and automatically fill (auto-fill) the correct login information into the necessary fields.
